title: Gospel hma lamah a thang zel
lyrics:
Gospel hma lamah a thang zel,
Khawvelah ram tinah;
Kan inkhawmna pawh a pung zel,
Ka thinlung, lawm fo la,
Mi tam tak thim atangte chuan,
An chhuak ang - nun changin;
Chhandamtu chawimawi ve atan,
An inkhawm ang - hlimin.

Jubili dar I tum ang u,
Thlalerah a ri dawn;
Mi zawng zawng lo haw vek rawh u,
Nunna in duh alawm,
Awmna min siamsak ka duh e,
Aw Lalpa, ka Pathian,
Kumkhawin Nang, ka fak ang che,
Khawvel ka dam lai hian.

Mi thianghlim fakna a chhho vang,
Pathian tilawm turin;
A ri pawh mi sualho zingah
A thang ang mawi takin.
Hei hian kan Lalber ropuizia,
Anni a hriattir ang;
Tin, an thingthi ve ang, bia
in,
Kan Pathian ke bulan.
